text: Yann Tiersen (born 23 June 1970) is a musician from France. He did the soundtrack songs from the movie Am√©lie. His music usually includes a large variety of instruments; primarily the guitar, synthesizer or violin together with instruments like the melodica, xylophone, toy piano, harpsichord, accordion and typewriter. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:21st-century French composers Category:French musicians
title: Yann Tiersen
